title: Datasets

title: Publications
text:
Ezin, E., Savran Kiziltepe, R., & Karakus, M., 2024, Using LLMs for Annotation and ML Methods for Comparative Analysis of Large-Scale Turkish Sentiment Datasets. In: 9th International Conference on Computer Science and Engineering (UBMK 2024): Antalya, Türkiye.
Savran Kiziltepe, R., Ezin, E., & Karakus, M., 2024, A Comparative Study of ML Models on Large-Scale Turkish Sentiment Datasets. In: Innovations in Intelligent Systems and Applications Conference (ASYU 2024): Ankara, Türkiye.

title: Meet Our Team
text:
Dr. Murat Karakuş
Dr. Murat Karakuş is a leading researcher in machine learning and artificial intelligence, specializing in multimedia data processing. He has numerous publications in top-tier journals.



 Dr. Rukiye Savran Kiziltepe
Dr. Rukiye Savran Kiziltepe focuses on Computer Vision and Natural Language Processing, with particular emphasis on Turkish language processing and sentiment analysis. She is actively involved in several interdisciplinary AI research projects.



 Dr. Ercan Ezin
Dr. Ercan Ezin specializes in the application of Recommender Systems and Large Language Models. He has a strong background in both academia and industry.

title: Advanced Natural Language and Multimedia Processing Lab
text:
The ANLAM Lab is part of the Software Engineering Department at Ankara University , dedicated to advancing research in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and multimedia technologies. The lab was established in 2024 and focuses on cutting-edge AI research, particularly in NLP, multimedia processing, and their intersection. Our work spans various domains, with current projects including (in no particular order):
For those interested in collaborating or joining our lab, please get in touch via Contact Page.

title: Advanced Natural Language and Multimedia Processing Lab
text:
Latest News

28 Aug ’24 – ANLAM LAB is BORN! Our team is excited to collaborate with industry leaders on a new project involving multimedia processing and sentiment analysis. Stay tuned for updates!


14 Aug ’24 – It is with the greatest joy that we announce our second conference paper on Turkish NLP studies has been accepted for the UBMK 2024 Conference, which will be held in Antalya, Türkiye, between October 26-28, 2024!


22 Jul ’24 – We successfully submitted a new pape for ASYU’24 conference! Update: The paper has been accepted. More info on Publications Page. See you at ASYU Conference in Gazi University, Ankara, Türkiye.
